rows.label: bf04240150_0010
rows.name: Then the culprit behind the attack...

rows.label: bf04240150_0020
rows.name:
...was not the artificial Blade
standing here now. Is that right?

rows.label: bf04240150_0030
rows.name:
They very similar, but not the
same. Nilny saw her with own eyes.

rows.label: bf04240150_0040
rows.name:
I had a feeling we were being
watched since our arrival.

rows.label: bf04240150_0050
rows.name: I quite sorry for causing concern.

rows.label: bf04240150_0060
rows.name:
Nilny has been "auditing"
Avaritia Trade Company.

rows.label: bf04240150_0070
rows.name:
Ah, so you were keeping an eye on us
because we came in on a Guild ship.

rows.label: bf04240150_0080
rows.name:
How ironic that your suspicion should
happen to prove our innocence.

rows.label: bf04240150_0090
rows.name:
...It seems this was my misunderstanding. I apologize
for the rudeness of suddenly starting a fight.

rows.label: bf04240150_0100
rows.name:
N-no, that's fine. Nobody got hurt in the end.
I'm just glad it all got cleared up now...

rows.label: bf04240150_0110
rows.name:
An apology from the illustrious
Flamebringer? A rare reward in itself.

rows.label: bf04240150_0120
rows.name:
Tora still not happy! Should get year's
supply of Tasty Sausages as compensation!

rows.label: bf04240150_0140
rows.name:
Hmm. I will do what I can within
my own means to compensate you.

rows.label: bf04240150_0150
rows.name:
By the way, the culprit who fled the scene... Might
I ask what manner of connection you have with them?

rows.label: bf04240150_0160
rows.name: Could you tell me about it?
